Class Expressions

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object
    Gives static access to create Expressions and Arguments.

    Author:

    • Method Detail

      • or

        public static Expression or(Expression... expressions)
        Parameters:
        expressions - the Expressions to combine(Conjunction, Expression...) using Conjunction.OR.
        Returns:
        an Expression that evaluates to true if any of the given Expressions does.

      • and

        public static Expression and(Expression... expressions)
        Parameters:
        expressions - the Expressions to combine(Conjunction, Expression...) using Conjunction.AND.
        Returns:
        an Expression that evaluates to true if all of the given Expressions do.

      • combine

        public static Expression combine(Conjunction conjunction,
                                 Expression... expressions)
        Parameters:
        conjunction - the Conjunction used to combine the given Expressions.
        expressions - the Expressions to combine using the given Conjunction.
        Returns:
        an Expression that combines the given Expressions with the given Conjunction.
        See Also:
        Conjunction.eval(boolean...)
